research.focus: Weekly performance summary: what worked this week, engagement analysis, key takeaways

competitors.name: Curran Soccer Academy
competitors.insight: Offering specialized training sessions focused on skill development for youth players, attracting parents looking for targeted improvement.

competitors.name: Pittsburgh Soccer Academy
competitors.insight: Promoting 1-on-1 training and youth camps, effectively reaching a broader audience through seasonal camps.

competitors.name: Riverhounds Development Academy
competitors.insight: Emphasizing a professional pathway for players, which appeals to parents interested in long-term development and college scholarships.

research.seasonal: February is a transitional month with school soccer tryouts approaching in March, creating urgency for training in preparation for the season.
content_opportunities: Tips for preparing for soccer tryouts
Training drills to improve specific skills before the season starts
research.recommended_action: Launch a targeted social media campaign promoting a 'Tryout Preparation Package' for youth players.
research.reasoning: This campaign will directly address the upcoming tryouts, positioning Fantasma as the go-to option for players seeking to enhance their skills and confidence before the season starts.
